Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • comp3111.webscraper.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    kevinw Controller class that manage GUI interaction. Please see document about JavaFX for details.

      • findValidItems

        public static double[] findValidItems(java.util.List<Item> items)
        Feature 1: Find out the information required for updating the summary tab
        Parameters:
        items: - a list of items Valid Item: item with price > 0
        Returns:
        a double array where the first item in array is the total of prices of valid item, the second item in the array is the number of valid item

        items: - a list of items
        Returns:
